name: The Atomy
description: This is a shooter about killed in fortieth gangster, who tries to wash away his guilt in the personal hell. He will have to pass a long way, because he is also responsible for the deeds of his ancestors and children.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Graphics: 512 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent) Graphics: 1024 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: + Trading cards + Intresting idea - Poorley executed!
Interesting game, with some nice ideas. I recommend getting it if you have some spare steam funds.
